## About Me

School

  I go to Appalachian State University. I am a Recreation Mangament Major with a minor in Statistics. I hope to persue a commercial recreation job with big resorts and work towards a more sustainable tourism industry.


Hobbies

Some of my hobbies include playing soccer, swimming, snowboarding and things alike. I also like to spend my time outside hiking and searching for things and places to explore.

I also enjoy everything cars although on the mecahnics side I am not very knowledgable. I enjoy looking at cars as well as driving cars.

### Other Facts and Things to Know About Me

I am student while pursuing an EMT career. I am not quite sure what I will do with my life just yet, but am working towards a couple of different things. 

I was born and raised until I was about Five in Arkansas. I currently live in North Carolina where I have been for the past 15 years or so.
